contexts.context: ..., you can simply tag the abbreviation using the <mark>abbr</mark> tag with a type value with the correct word...
...must tag the abbreviation using the full choice, <mark>abbr</mark>, and expan method below:
...To do so, first tag the abbreviation with the <mark>abbr</mark> element, then tag your expansion with an expan...
...this case, just wrap the w in an <mark>abbr</mark> and then use a choice and expan as above:...
<<mark>abbr</mark>>
